bilingual.source: There is a television in the library.
Television is watched all over the world.
Is there a television in your classroom?
Television news is updated as it happens.

bilingual.target: 你不应该看这么多电视。

bilingual.source: Betty never watches television in the morning.
bilingual.target: 贝蒂从不在早上看电视。

bilingual.source: Mad Men is an American television drama series.
bilingual.target: 《广告狂人》是一部美国电视剧。

list.abstract: television是于1973年在美国纽约组建的一支乐队，现任成员包括Tom Verlaine、Fred Smith、Billy Ficca、Jimmy Ripp，前成员为Richard Lloyd、Richard Hell。 television的曲势和节奏复杂异常，同时有充满感情和灵性的吉他弹奏，其音乐风格为朋克、艺术朋克、新浪潮、原始朋克，专辑有《television》，代表歌曲有《No Glamour For Willi》《Marquee Moon（Lp Version）》等。
television是一个英语单词，可以用作名词，翻译为电视、电视机等。当表示“电视机”的意思时可数，表示电视节目时不可数。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Zebra is watching television.
yingyinNormal.zh: 斑马先生正在看电视。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa has made her own television.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩佩做了她自己的电视。

yingyinNormal.en: There are more disturbing things on television.
yingyinNormal.zh: 电视上还有更让人烦心的事

yingyinNormal.en: You know, my television career began unexpectedly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实，我的电视生涯是在不经意中开始的。

yingyinNormal.en: Mummy, where is the queen's television? They didn't have television then.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈妈，皇后的电视放在哪里呀？她们那时候没有电视机。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I was on television by the time I was 19 years old.
yingyinNormal.zh: 于是，我在19岁那年上了电视。

yingyinNormal.en: We can make movies with it and watch them on our television.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可以自己拍影片然后电视里面看！

yingyinNormal.en: We can make movies with it and watch them on our television!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可以自己拍影片然后电视里面看！

yingyinNormal.en: How can you be here and there? Because it's a television show!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎么会在两个地方？因为那是电视节目。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and her family are watching Mr. Potato on television. I love watching programs about keeping fit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和家人们在看土豆先生的电视节目。我喜欢看这些关于减肥的电视节目。

yingyinNormal.en: I just want to watch a little television. What is the big deal? Geez, relax mom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是想看点电视，有何不对？放轻松，妈。

yingyinNormal.en: To use television to illuminate the transcendent power of our better angels.
yingyinNormal.zh: 利用电视媒体，彰显我们更好的天使的超凡力量。

yingyinNormal.en: I know what we can do. We can watch the television. Oh, it won't go on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道我们可以做什么。我们可以看电视。噢，它打不开的。

yingyinNormal.en: George looks on top of the television. But Daddy Pig's glasses are not there. Oh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治找了电视机的上面，但是爸爸的眼镜也不在那。噢。

yingyinNormal.en: George looks on top of the television. But Daddy Pig's glasses are not there. Oh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治找了电视机的上面，但是爸爸的眼镜也不在那。噢。

yingyinNormal.en: Is it on the sofa? No. Is it on the television? No. It's not anywhere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是不是在沙发上？不在。他是不是在电视机上？不在。哪里都找不到啊。

yingyinNormal.en: What did you do? Did you change the contrast or brightness settings on the television? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你对他干了啥？你改了电视机的对比度和亮度？没啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and her family are watching their favorite television program, Detective Potato.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和她的家人正在观看她们最喜欢的电视节目，土豆侦探。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and her family are watching their favorite television program, Detective Potato.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和她的家人正在观看她们最喜欢的电视节目，土豆侦探。

yingyinNormal.en: I bet the ratings weren't good for the first 25. You know, before there was television.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我敢说前25年的收视率一定不太好，那时根本没有电视机。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the activity, profession, or medium of broadcasting on television

examination_example.sentence: It might mean spending less time watching <highlight>television</highlight> or listening to music, though some people can write while they listen to music.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可能意味着花更少的时间看电视或听音乐，尽管有些人可以一边听音乐一边写作。

examination_example.sentence: In the movies and on <highlight>television</highlight>, artificial intelligence is typically depicted as something sinister that will upend our way of life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在电影和电视中，人工智能通常被描绘成颠覆我们生活方式的邪恶事物。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Television</highlight> is a one-way tap flowing into our homes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电视是一个单向的水龙头，涌入我们的家庭。

examination_example.sentence: The challenge the computer mounts to <highlight>television</highlight> thus bears little similarity to the manner of record players being replaced by CD players.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，计算机对电视的挑战与 CD 播放器取代唱片播放器的方式几乎没有相似之处。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the activity, profession, or medium of broadcasting on television

examination_example.sentence: How has <highlight>television</highlight> impacted Americans?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电视对美国人有何影响？

examination_example.sentence: In his lifetime, Marconi foresaw the development of <highlight>television</highlight> and the fax machine, GPS, radar, and the portable hand-held telephone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Marconi在有生之年预见到了电视、传真机、GPS、雷达和便携式手持电话的发展。

examination_example.sentence: Indeed, within minutes the fire occupied headlines of every major global newspaper and <highlight>television</highlight> network.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 确实，几分钟之内，大火占据了全球各大报纸和电视网络的头条。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the activity; profession; or medium of broadcasting on television

examination_example.sentence: Alzheimer's patients tend to watch <highlight>television</highlight> more than 3 hours a day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿尔茨海默病患者每天看电视的时间往往超过 3 小时。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Television</highlight> viewing may be a potential factor for Alzheimer's disease.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看电视可能是阿尔茨海默病的一个潜在因素。

examination_example.sentence: Watch <highlight>television</highlight> no more than 3 hours each day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天看电视不超过3小时。

examination_example.sentence: Although frozen dinners were invented in the '40s, their popularity didn't boom until <highlight>televisions</highlight> became popular a decade or so later.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管冷冻晚餐是在40年代发明的，但直到大约十年后电视开始流行，它们才开始流行起来。

examination_example.sentence: There are plenty of recipes (食谱) , how-to videos and cooking classes available to anyone who has a computer, smartphone or <highlight>television</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 任何拥有电脑、智能手机或电视的人都可以使用大量食谱、操作视频和烹饪课程。

名词后缀

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the activity, profession, or medium of broadcasting on television

examination_example.sentence: She has been a radio <highlight>TV</highlight> reporter for many years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她当广播电视记者已经很多年了。

examination_example.sentence: James, you've been watching <highlight>TV</highlight> for the whole evening.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 詹姆斯，你整个晚上都在看电视。

examination_example.sentence: Although there was an age difference, we both came from a tradition of theater and live <highlight>TV</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然年龄相差悬殊，但我们都来自于戏剧和电视直播的传统行业。

examination_example.sentence: There is L'Enigme sans Fin from 1938, works on paper, objects, and projects for stage and screen and selected parts from <highlight>television</highlight> programmes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这里有1938年的《无尽之谜》，多幅纸本作品、物品、用于舞台和银幕上的草图及电视节目片段。

examination_example.sentence: My color <highlight>television</highlight> has given me nothing but a headache.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的彩电除了让我头疼之外，什么也没带给我。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Sam was sitting on the couch, watching <highlight>television</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 萨姆坐在沙发上看电视节目。

examination_example.sentence: He was even invited to appear on <highlight>television</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他甚至被邀请上电视节目。

examination_example.sentence: She appeared on <highlight>television</highlight> programs and in newspapers and magazines all over the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她出现在世界各地的电视节目和报纸杂志上。

examination_example.sentence: In front of the <highlight>television</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在电视机前。

examination_example.sentence: This is totally different from the way our parents used <highlight>television</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这与我们父母使用电视的方式完全不同。

examination_example.sentence: Without the <highlight>television</highlight> set，the radio and more importantly，the computer，we will seldom have any fun in our homes today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有电视机、收音机，更重要的是没有电脑的话，我们今天在家里会失去很多乐趣。
